import React from "react"; import {Card, CardComponent, Typography, Grid, CardContent} from '@material-ui/core'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Cards = ({data:{confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate}}) => { console.log(confirmed); if(!confirmed){ return "Loading..." } return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of Active Cases of Covid-19 Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of Recoveries of Covid-19 Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of Deaths caused by Covid-19
) } export default Cards;
